alert.note: Alert for Chaves; De Baca; Lincoln (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 26 at 1:14PM MDT until September 26 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in central New Mexico... Southwestern De Baca County in east central New Mexico... Northwestern Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico... * Until 200 PM MDT. * At 114 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ramon, or 30 miles southeast of Vaughn, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ramon. This includes Highway 285 between Mile Markers 154 and 183. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
